bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard Criteria for the Design, Installation, and Qualification of Raceway Systems for Class 1E Circuits for Nuclear Power Generating Stations
IEEE Draft Standard Criteria for the Design, Installation, and Qualification of Raceway Systems for Class 1E Circuits for Nuclear Power Generating Stations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Criteria for the minimum requirements in the selection design, installation, and qualification of raceway systems for Class 1E circuits for nuclear power generating stations are provided in this standard. Methods for the structural qualification of raceway systems for Class 1E circuits are also prescribed.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
